attributes.action: Abolish Taxes for Women in order for us to shop more..
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I was looking at my latest payslip from work and was astonished by the amount of tax I am paying!  That amount of tax could have bought me a Gucci bag so instead of us women having to pay tax the PM should give it us back to use for shopping purposes!

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
